mapper.select: select im.id,im.create_time,toUser.id as toUserId,toUser.nickname as toUserNickname,toUser.avatar as toUserAvatar from blog_im_room im left join (select u.id,u.nickname,u.avatar from `cxblog-cloud`.sys_user u) fromUser on fromUser.id = im.from_user_id left join (select u.id,u.nickname,u.avatar from `cxblog-cloud`.sys_user u) toUser on toUser.id = im.to_user_id where im.from_user_id=#{userId} order by create_time desc
